page.title: 03EDUCATION
page.content: There are L.E.A.(C.E.) {Primary {Schools}at Lostock Gralam and Wincham. At Nether Tabley there is a small isolated L.E.A. Primary School serving the children of the local farms. Primary school children from Plumley travel to nearby Lower Peover C.E.school, and those from Pickmere to Wincham. Roman Catholic children attend primary schools in Northwich and Knutsford. There are several private primary schools in towns nearby. {Secondary education:}Children of 11+ years are transported by contract buses and private cars to L.E.A. comprehensive schools or independent schools in local towns e.g. Northwich, Knutsford, Altrincham, Manchester, Chester.
